channel.title: Grey Template - One Page Template

item.title: Grey Template - One Page Template
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:9, topic:518542”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=636807.msg4293491#msg4293491 date=1367784018]
Did you even read what I said lol. I said about the readability not the content of the paragraph, and it’s nothing to do with resolution either, there are two many characters on the line, the human eye dislikes it.
See:
http://baymard.com/blog/line-length-readability
http://designfestival.com/achieving-good-legibility-and-readability-on-the-web/ (measure part)
http://css-tricks.com/forums/discussion/11910/website-critique-readability/p1

[/quote]
I understand that but, whoever downloads it can put whatever they want there and or alter it as they please. I only used that length of a paragraph for a text placeholder.

Hey i tried to install this and the problem is this: http://prntscr.com/13kmwd
I am sure i added everything correctly

Make sure the path to the images are correct with the correct file extension.[/quote]
thnx’s already figured it out tho.

Read full topic

item.title: Grey Template - One Page Template
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:8, topic:518542”]Did you even read what I said lol. I said about the readability not the content of the paragraph, and it’s nothing to do with resolution either, there are two many characters on the line, the human eye dislikes it.
See:
http://baymard.com/blog/line-length-readability
http://designfestival.com/achieving-good-legibility-and-readability-on-the-web/ (measure part)
http://css-tricks.com/forums/discussion/11910/website-critique-readability/p1[/quote]
I understand that but, whoever downloads it can put whatever they want there and or alter it as they please. I only used that length of a paragraph for a text placeholder.

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:6, topic:518542”]Hey i tried to install this and the problem is this: http://prntscr.com/13kmwd
I am sure i added everything correctly[/quote]
Make sure the path to the images are correct with the correct file extension.

item.title: Grey Template - One Page Template
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:5, topic:518542”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=636807.msg4293299#msg4293299 date=1367743185]
Readability of the about us paragraph is bad, way too many characters in one line. Research readability on the web
[/quote]
I only used lorem ipsum for a text filler. And if you’re talking about the text in the image, I re-sized the image from 1688x1018 to 850x513 so it fits in the thread a little bit better.

Edit: Changed the background image to fit the style a little bit more.[/quote]
Did you even read what I said lol. I said about the readability not the content of the paragraph, and it’s nothing to do with resolution either, there are two many characters on the line, the human eye dislikes it.
See:
http://baymard.com/blog/line-length-readability
http://designfestival.com/achieving-good-legibility-and-readability-on-the-web/ (measure part)
http://css-tricks.com/forums/discussion/11910/website-critique-readability/p1

item.title: Grey Template - One Page Template
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

SilentCJ:

Readability of the about us paragraph is bad, way too many characters in one line. Research readability on the web

I only used lorem ipsum for a text filler. And if you’re talking about the text in the image, I re-sized the image from 1688x1018 to 850x513 so it fits in the thread a little bit better.

Edit: Changed the background image to fit the style a little bit more.

Read full topic

item.title: Grey Template - One Page Template
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I understand the Black Ops picture can be changed but shouldn’t have released it like this - doesn’t fit with that background (bad advertisement I guess you could say). Other than that, I don’t find this to be appealing as it feels like I’ve seen this over-and-over (exaggerating but that’s how it feels).

Read full topic

item.title: Grey Template - One Page Template
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Image:

You may not remove any rights from the existing footer.
You may only remove the Treyarch if you change the slideshow images.
You may only add onto the existing footer.

Codes:
Index.html:

<!DOCTYPE html>

<html>

<head>
	<title>Grey Theme - Home</title>
	<link href="css/main.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
	<link href="css/navigation.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
	<link href="css/flexslider.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
	<link href="css/font-awesome.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
	<link href="css/font-awesome.min.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
	<script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.6.2/jquery.min.js"></script>
	<script src="js/flexslider.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		$(window).load(function() {
			$('.flexslider').flexslider({
				animation: "slide"
			});
		});
	</script>
</head>

<body>
	<nav id="navWrapper">
		<ul>
			<li><a href="index.html" class="active">Home</a></li>
			<li><a href="forum/">Fourm</a></li>
			<li><a href="game.html">Play Now</a></li>
			<li><a href="highscores/">Highscores</a></li>
			<li><a href="membership.html">Membership</a></li>
		</ul>
	</nav>
	<a href="index.html">
		<div class="imageBanner"></div>
	</a>
	<div id="wrapper">
		<div class="newsBox background">
			<marquee behavior="scroll" direction="left" scrollamount="2">Welcome to ServerName</marquee>
		</div>
		<div class="sliderContainer background" align="center">
			<div class="flexslider">
				<ul class="slides">
					<li><img src="img/slide1.jpg" alt="Slide 1"/></li>
					<li><img src="img/slide2.jpg" alt="Slide 2"/></li>
					<li><img src="img/slide3.jpg" alt="Slide 3"/></li>
					<li><img src="img/slide4.jpg" alt="Slide 4"/></li>
					<li><img src="img/slide5.jpg" alt="Slide 5"/></li>
					<li><img src="img/slide6.jpg" alt="Slide 6"/></li>
				</ul>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="content bothBorder background">
			<div class="contentHeader">About Us</div>
			<article>
				<a href="index.php">Lorem</a> ipsum dolor sit amet...
			</article>
		</div>
		<div class="content bothBorder background">
			<div class="textBox rightBorder">
				<div class="contentHeader">Play Now For Free</div>
				<article>
					<span class="fontAwesome"><a href="index.php"><i class="ease icon-play"></i></a></span><br />
					Play for free or purchase membership for a better experience.
				</article>
			</div>
			<div class="textBox rightBorder">
				<div class="contentHeader">Join The Community</div>
				<article>
					<span class="fontAwesome"><a href="index.php"><i class="ease icon-comments"></i></a></span><br />
					Join the online community of ServerName to be kept up to date with game content.
				</article>
			</div>
			<div class="textBox">
				<div class="contentHeader">Create An Account</div>
				<article>
					<span class="fontAwesome"><a href="login/register.php"><i class="ease icon-plus-sign"></i></a></span><br />
					Create an account and join the fun while playing ServerName.
				</article>
			</div>
		</div>
		<footer class="topBorder background">
			Design by: <a href="http://www.rspsdesigns.com">RSPSDesigns</a> Your Site © 2099<br />
			Certain images are the property of <a href="http://www.treyarch.com/">Treyarch</a> © 2013
		</footer>
	</div>
</body>

</html>

Main.css:

* {
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
	color: #bfbfbf;
}

* a {
	color: #bfbfbf;
}

* a:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
}

body {
	background: #000 url('../img/bg.jpg') center fixed;
}

.background {
	background: url('../img/pattern.png');
}

.imageBanner {
	background: url('../img/logo.png') no-repeat;
	width: 780px;
	height: 125px;
	margin: 0px auto auto auto;
}

#wrapper {
	max-width: 1260px;
	min-width: 780px;
	margin: 0px auto;
	padding: 10px 100px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

.bothBorder {
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(24,24,24);
	border-top: 1px solid rgb(51,51,51);
}

.topBorder {
	border-top: 1px solid rgb(51,51,51);
}

.content {
	padding: 10px;
}

.textBox {
	max-width: 32%;
	min-width: 15%;
	float: left;
	padding: 5px;
	text-align: center;
}

.textBox article li {
	list-style: none;
}

.newsBox {
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(24,24,24);
	text-align: center;
	padding: 10px;
}

.rightBorder {
	border-right: 1px solid #fff;
	list-style: none;
	margin: 0px auto;
}

.sliderContainer {
	min-width: 780px;
	max-width: 1260px;
	padding-bottom: 1px;
	border-top: 1px solid rgb(51,51,51);
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(24,24,24);
}

.flexslider {
	width: 940px;
	height: 313px;
	padding: 10px;
	margin-top: 30px;
}

footer {
	padding: 10px;
	text-align: center;
}

.contentHeader {
	font-size: 1.5em;
	font-family: Impact, Arial, sans-serif;
	text-align: center;
}

.ease {
	transition: all 0.5s ease;
}

span.fontAwesome {
	text-shadow: 0 0 10px #fff;
	font-size: 6em;
}

span.fontAwesome a {
	text-decoration: none;
}

span.fontAwesome a:hover {
	text-shadow: 0 0 25px #fff;
}

Download: Click here
